Text.Page:
Lazy! Every last one of them! I think they purposely wander off to "take care of the archaeologists."

Frankly, I hope the archaeologists get buried in ruins. Less of an annoyance to me.

In the meantime, the {@LinkCreature:18#10#sentinel} and {@LinkCreature:18#12#warblade golems} keep cropping up everywhere. Get rid of them, and maybe I'll consider letting you join our group permanently.

Well done.

Full time employment? , you should know that some people will tell you whatever it takes to get the job done.

I'm one of them.
